alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Southwest Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 3:38AM MST until February 26 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, with locally up to 4 inches in the higher elevations of Zion National Park and in the upper Grand Staircase. * WHERE...Southwest Utah, Zion National Park, Bryce Canyon Country and South Central Utah. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially through Black Ridge Canyon early this morning. For those planning outdoor activities, plan on wintry conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Southwest Utah; Zion National Park
